price: ‘য’ত তুমি বক্ৰতা আৰু খলা-বমা একোৱে দেখা নাপাবা’।
arabic: لَّا تَرَىٰ فِيهَا عِوَجٗا وَلَآ أَمۡتٗا

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: lā tarā fīhā ʿiwajan walā amtan
